FuncDef:
The pppoe-server bind command binds the VT to the interface on the device through which the user accesses the network.
The undo pppoe-server bind command deletes the VT bound to the interface on the device through which the user accesses the network.
By default, VT0 is bound to the interface on the device through which the user accesses the network.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the number of a VT.
The value ranges from 0 to 1023.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
You need to create a VT before binding it to the interface on the through which the user access the network. You can configure parameters for PPP on the VT.
If the pppoe-server bind command is run more than once in the same view, the latest configuration overrides the previous one.
Configuration Impact
If the pppoe-server bind command is run more than once in the same view, the latest configuration overrides the previous one.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
